clinical_study.brief_title: Pilot Study for Determination of Total Energy Expenditure and Fat Oxidation in Children
clinical_study.official_title: Pilot Study for Determination of Total Energy Expenditure and Fat Oxidation in Children.

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine energy expenditure and fat oxidation in 2 year old children.

primary_outcome.measure: To determine total energy expenditure in 2 year old children
primary_outcome.description: Doubly labeled water is administered to 2 year old children and urine is collected at different time points.

primary_outcome.measure: To determine fat oxidation in children
primary_outcome.description: Deuterated palmitate is administered and urine is collected at different time points.

study_pop.textblock: 10 toddlers born from mothers of the Glowing study (NCT01131117)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- 1.5-2.5 years of age
- Mother is a participant in the Glowing study (protocol NCT01131117)
- Healthy without taking medication that can affect study outcomes, as determined by the PI.
Exclusion Criteria:
- None listed
